param.name: registryRoot
param.span: 目標架構的根登錄位置。

span.span: The root registry location for the targeted framework.

span.span: For .NET this is SOFTWARE\MICROSOFT\\.NETFramework.
The targeted framework version (2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, ….).

param.span: 資料夾的名稱 (AssemblyFoldersEx) 也可以是 PocketPC\AssemblyFoldersEx 或其他。

param.name: osVersion
param.span: 在登錄中的最小和最大目標作業系統版本。

span.span: The targeted minimum and maximum OS versions in the registry.

param.span: 這些值會用來只傳回所宣告的最小和最大作業系統版本之間的目錄。

span.span: These values are used to return only directories for OS versions between the declared minimum and maximum.

param.span: 如果此值為空白或 null，則不進行篩選。

span.span: If this value is blank or null, no filtering is done.

param.name: platform
param.span: 目標平台 GUID。

span.span: The targeted platform GUIDs.

param.span: 用來只傳回具有相符平台 GUID 的目錄。

span.span: Used to return only directories which have a matching platform GUID.

param.span: 如果此值為空白或 null，則不進行篩選。

span.span: If this value is blank or null no filtering is done.

param.name: targetProcessorArchitecture
param.span: 目標處理器架構。

span.span: The targeted processor architecture.

param.span: 這會決定要搜尋哪一個登錄區，以及其搜尋順序。

span.span: This determines which registry hives are searched and in which order.

summary.span: 取得 物件的已排序清單，這些物件包含協力廠商組件註冊所在之目錄的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets a sorted list of objects which contain information about the directories in which the third party assemblies are registered.

summary.span: 這項資訊會在建置與設計階段使用。

span.span: This information is used at build and design time.

returns.span: 傳回 的清單。

span.span: Returns list of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉`AssemblyFoldersEx`登錄位置，並傳回清單的`AssemblyFoldersExInfo`的相同順序，它們會搜尋參考組件，在設計和建置時間。This method enumerates the `AssemblyFoldersEx` registry location and returns the list of `AssemblyFoldersExInfo` in the same order that they are searched for reference assemblies at design and build time. 在 64 位元作業系統上，如果目標 64 位元，將 64 位元登錄區中然後 32 位元登錄區中。如果目標 32 位元，，將 32 位元登錄區中然後 64 位元登錄區。On a 64-bit operating system, if targeting 64-bit, add in the 64-bit hive then the 32-bit hive; if targeting 32-bit, add in the 32-bit hive then the 64-bit hive. 只有 32 位元電腦上新增 32 位元登錄區中。On 32-bit machine only add in the 32-bit hive.
